answers.question: Desktop GUI Diagnostics Scope
answers.answer: C top priority, A second priority. The focus is on shipping a functional product

answers.question: Diagnostic Display Format
answers.answer: C - note I am using an ultrawide monitor - make the window as wide as you like. Also add a metric conversion option for dimensionless units in the GUI

answers.question: Web GUI OpenGL/WebGL Enhancement Scope
answers.answer: c - the ultimate goal is an option for volumetric lighting using the powerful RT hardware in this machine. Convert the data from a point cloud to a polygon/volumetric/etc set if necessary and take note of the data interpolation script too

answers.question: Placeholder Button Implementation Priority
answers.answer: a and b, but design with c in mind for future

answers.question: Temperature Data Bug Fix
answers.answer: yes investigate and when you find all the other bugs like it investigate those too
